review: This is such a great product.  I abandoned my cable service and now save a considerable amount of money by using the Fire TV Stick.  It's one of the best purchases I've made in a long time.
author: Suzanne Emile

review: Made my dumb TV smart. Much better Amazon Prime interface than with my Vizio Smart TV. Easy to navigate, plays Amazon Prime music, nice screen saver. I still have some issues with buffering, but Netflix has yet to completely fail me yet like it used to. I've had one ad pop up, but it was very short and for an Amazon TV show.
author: Sarah Hugo

review: It runs some things.  It is just a locked down Android.  If it would allow you to run third party apps without jumping through a bunch of hoops. It would be much better.
author: j.chapman

review: Very easy to set up and use immediately. I would have given 5 stars, but I have issues with buffering in middle of programs, but that's due to my router, not the FireStick...
author: Jane M. Wood

review: I love it. I wish it played DVD's and I could replace my current streaming device.
author: Jessica Ruhle
